body_html:
Experiment has a method train_and_evaluate, which does the approach you wanted. However, it has a double memory problem, which is why continous_train_and_evaluate was introduced (as experimental). Can you try make train steps for each iteration larger (so one train iteration can process one epoch training data or multiple epoch data)?

If that does not solve the problem, you probably need to try train_and_evaluate or write a hook to do evaluation by calling train().
